message: Hello, I've followed your post to produce a hillshaded map of the north Atlantic sea floor yet I get these light color stains next to shaded areas and I'm not sure why. Please let me know how can I send you the image to show this. Thanks in advance. Kind regards.
message_html: Hello, I’ve followed your post to produce a hillshaded map of the north Atlantic sea floor yet I get these light color stains next to shaded areas and I’m not sure why. Please let me know how can I send you the image to show this. Thanks in advance. Kind regards.
